datas.titre: We are doing the best we can... and other lies
How to be stuck between the winner you want to be and the loser you actually are
How to ruin your life by worrying about thinges you can't control
Yes and other things you feel obligated to say
How to mess up something good by looking for something better to end up with something worse
Nice to see you too... and other lies
How to pretend to be normal
All the thoughts I don't express bu expect you to figure out by yourself
How to spend your whole life worrying about what other people think about you only to realize when you're old that nobody was thinking about you in the first place
How to always do what you have always done and therefore always get what you have always got
How to sit back, do nothing and criticize everybody else
How to want it when you can't have it and get it when you don't want it
How to make your parents sad with your poor choices
How to avoid criticism by doing nothing, saying nothing and being nothing
How to be sorry but not sorry enough not to do it again
How to avoid problems by not being born
How to have fun on your way to your grave
How to stay silent so others keep believing that you are smart
How to play by the rules ans end up poor
